thread.title: CM Omar Approves Rs 19.99 Crore STP for Ganderbal | Kashmir Life
thread.title_full: CM Omar Approves Rs 19.99 Crore STP for Ganderbal | Kashmir Life

author: KL News Network
title: CM Omar Approves Rs 19.99 Crore STP for Ganderbal | Kashmir Life
text:
SRINAGAR : Jammu Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah has approved the “Used Water Management Project”, which includes the construction of a Rs 19.99 crore Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) in Ganderbal town.
Announcing the decision on X, the Office of the Chief Minister, Jammu Kashmir, stated that the project will ensure proper treatment of used water, maintain river cleanliness, and enhance public health and sanitation standards across the region.
Chief Minister has approved the “Used Water Management Project”, which includes a ₹19.99 crore Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) for Ganderbal town.
This will ensure proper treatment of used water, keep our rivers clean and improve public health and sanitation. #Ganderbal …
— Office of Chief Minister, J&K (@CM_JnK) November 6, 2025
The upcoming STP is expected to play a crucial role in enhancing environmental protection and improving the quality of life for residents in Ganderbal.
